content: last 2 sts sl2pwyif work these 2 row a total of 6-7-7-7 times there are here 25-26-28-28 sts on the needles do not break yarn front next rs row work both front parts together as follows work the 25-26-28-28 sts of the right shoulder as sts present cast on 10-12-12-12 new sts using the backward loop method work the 25-26-28-28 sts of the left shoulder as sts present there are here 60-64-68-68 sts on the needles work 5-3-7-7 row in st sts with right & left rib band edges back and forth next rs row work increases at both side of the front as follows row 1 rs k2 p1 4 times k1 m1l k to last 13 sts m1r k1 p1 k2 4 times row 2 ws sl2pwyif work as sts present to last 2 sts sl2pwyif work these 2 row a total of 10- 11-12-13 times there are now 80- 86-92-94 sts on the needles do not break yarn 4 tricodo © copyright 2025 body now join the back and front on 4 5 mm us 7 to work in the round cast on 4-7-10-13 sts with an i-cord cast on method at underarms as follows work across front sts as they present to last 2 sts * kfb k1 slip last 2 sts from rn to ln * repeat from * to * 4-7-10-13 times in total kfb k2tog with last st of rn and next st of ln which is the 1rst st of the back part pm for bor after the 1-4-4-7 new st work across back sts as they present to last 2 sts * kfb k1 slip last 2 sts from rn to ln * repeat from * to * 4-7-10-13 times in total kfb k2tog with last st of rn and next st of ln which is the 1rst st of the front part pm after the 1-4-4-7 new st k to 13-16-16-19 sts bef bor 172 - 186-204-214 sts on the needles work next 3 rnds as follows sl bor k2 p1 5-5-6-6 times k to 13-16-16-19 sts bef next m p1 k2 4-5-5-6 times p1 slm k2 p1 5-5-6-6 times k to 13-16-16-19 sts bef bor p1 k2 4-5-5-6 times p1 the rib band goes on at the right side & will be stopped at the left side work as follows sl bor k2 p1 4-4-5-5 times k working the right side rib band slipping its marker to last 10- 13-13-16 sts bef bor p1 k2 3-4-4-5 times p1 repeat this round twice next round sl bor k2 p1 3-3-4-4 times k working the right side rib band slipping its marker to last 7-10- 10-13 sts bef bor p1 k2 2-3-3-4 times p1 repeat this round once next round sl bor k2 p1 2-2-3-3 times k working the right side rib band slipping its marker to last 4-7- 7-10 sts bef bor p1 k2 1-2-2-3 times p1 continue ribbing only at the right side work next rnds as follows sl
